text: The Littlest Hobo was a Canadian children's show directed by Charles R. Rondeau. It was based on a movie and is about a German Shepherd that wanders from town to town, helping people in need. The TV series ran from 1963-1965 and was later revived by CTV from 1979-1985. ==Other websites== * (movie) * * (1960s series) * (1970s revival) Category:1958 movies Category:1960s television series Category:1970s television series Category:1980s Canadian television series Category:English-language movies Category:Fictional dogs Category:Movies about dogs
title: The Littlest Hobo
